content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Greetings Yi-Nuo Wang. While discussing rental price for this Duisburg apartment, let me start with a higher figure to test your flexibility. I propose a monthly rent of 1200 Euros. Now, please consider if you're willing to accept such an amount. Remember, if you agree with a certain price, say 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' and if you want to continue negotiating, no specific response is needed. TERMINATE when the negotiation ends, whether an agreement is reached or not.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
